title: Number of U.S. minimum wage workers , by education 2018
summary: The chart shows the Number of workers thousands at the U.S. street .

\\n The highest Number was 606 in the Associate_degree Educational followed by 538 thousands in the High_school_graduates_no_college Educational , 330 thousands in Associate_degree and finally 137 thousands in Bachelor's_degree_and_higher .

data.Educational attainment: Less than a high school diploma

gold: This statistic shows the number of workers paid hourly rates at or below the prevailing federal minimum wage in the United States in 2018 , by educational attainment . In 2018 , around 330,000 people without a high school diploma earned the minimum wage or below .
